title: soft/plugin that would randomize each letter in text using random font/typeface from a defined set?
content:
is there such a plugin that would randomize each letter?  
or even better where i would specify a set of typefaces, size amplitude etc, and then the text would be randomized.

thanks a lot

have been searching through google, but cant find anything.

maybe have to program myself, if there is no such product available?

thanks,

hardijs  
viskers(at)gmail.com
author: hardijs

comments.content:
I'm not sure I understand. Do you mean software that'll turn some text into something like a ransom note based on certain parameters that you'd set?

--Jim K.

let me explain.  
lets say i have this paragraph.  
i want to specify that lets say typefaces arial, tahoma, garamond would be used and bold,italic and size from 10 to 16 would be used by randomly applying these parameters to each letter of this paragraph.\the outcome would look different size, weight and 3 different fonts.

thanks

hardijs

If I would have to do this I would script it at application level (e.g. InDesign, Illustrator). Fairly easy to do and it leaves you with full control over interface, options etc, and most important: you don't have to hassle with fonts.

Paul
